story.name: Part of the crew...
story.introduction: You wake up in a dirty and messed up prison cell. You can hear a snoozing nearby. You look out of the tiny window and realize it's night.

place.name: Prison Cell
place.description: The cell is small and dirty. Dead rats and skeletons lay on the ground.

item.name: Rusted Nail
item.description: This is a rusted nail which can be used to unlock a chest or something.

item.name: Chair
item.description: This is a wooden chair which can be used to sit on.

furniture.name: Table
furniture.description: This is a massive wooden table, but one plank isn't fixed.

content-item.name: Plank
content-item.description: This is a massive wooden plank. To be hit by that might hurt and knock you out for hours.

obstacle.description: You need something to screw the loose plank off.
obstacle.resolution: You used the gold coin as a screwdriver and a wooden plank drops on the floor.
